name: Age of Empires II: The Conquerors
name_original: Age of Empires II: The Conquerors
description:
Age of Empires II: The Conquerors is a strategy game developed by Ensebmle Studios. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Microsoft Studios. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Age of Empires II: The Conquerors is available on PC.
David Rippy, Joe Ybarra, Stuart Moulder and Tim Znamenacek produced the game. It was directed by David P. Kubalak, Sandy Petersen and Tony Goodman. David Rippy, Kevin McMullan, Rob Wallace and Stephen Rippy scored the game.
